channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harvey Willgoose's devastated mum issues heartbreaking 'please stop' knife crime plea
item.description: The 'heartbroken' mum of a teenager who died after being stabbed at school battles tears during a break away in Turkey to deliver her latest appeal fo...

item.title: Home Bargains slashes 94% off 'amazing' £32 L'Oreal eye serum that's now £1.99
item.description: Beauty enthusiasts and savvy shoppers have been flocking to their local stores to take advantage of the £30 discount offer

item.title: M11 traffic chaos as lorry smashes into barriers and motorway closed
item.description: Shock photos show the lorry leaning over the hard shoulder following an incident which forced authorities to shutter the M11 for "vehicle recovery" be...

item.title: Flight attendant's toothbrush warning to hotel guests leaves people 'freaked out'
item.description: Barbiebac La Azafata, 32, has issued an urgent warning for those staying in hotels and it has left some people 'freaked out' - with some saying they '...

item.title: Two common spice rack herbs could reverse Alzheimer's Disease
item.description: A compound inside the popular ingredients has been turned into a new treatment that might reverse Alzheimer's Disease

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.
